channel.title: ScapR - The time is yours
channel.description:
[center][b]Help wanted![/b][/center]
The server is [b]LIVE[/b] also hosted on a vps we have a very talented web dev aswell. so this is NOT a project, we need someone asap!
You can check out our website [url=http://scapr.net]Scapr[/url]
We're in need of a [b]CLIENT SPECIALIST[/b] What I mean by client specialist is someone who is a expert or experienced in client side development.
Take a look at our server features down below, if you're interested in the position contact me at euntrapreneur@live.com or fill the forum out below and I'll get back to you!
Form [code] Rate your experience 1-10, 10 being the best. Are you consistent with your work? What type of client do you specialize in? Can you create interfaces, add sprites, models? Age Msn[/code]
[img]http://sillybutts.net/image/page/small/top.png[/img]
